com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler

Class DefaultScheduler.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.DefaultScheduler.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    DefaultScheduler

    public static class DefaultScheduler.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class for DefaultSchedulers. Uses provided custom values or reasonable defaults. Instances may be created via DefaultScheduler.newBuilder(ServiceSpec).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DefaultScheduler build()
      Creates a new scheduler instance with the provided values or their defaults.
      ServiceSpec getServiceSpec()
      Returns the ServiceSpec which was provided via the constructor.
      StateStore getStateStore()
      Returns the StateStore provided via setStateStore(StateStore), or a reasonable default created via DefaultScheduler.createStateStore(ServiceSpec).
      DefaultScheduler.Builder setCapabilities(Capabilities capabilities)
      Allow setting the capabilities of the DC/OS cluster.
      DefaultScheduler.Builder setConfigStore(ConfigStore<ServiceSpec> configStore)
      Specifies a custom ConfigStore, otherwise the return value of DefaultScheduler.createConfigStore(ServiceSpec) will be used.
      DefaultScheduler.Builder setConfigValidators(java.util.Collection<ConfigValidator<ServiceSpec>> configValidators)
      Specifies a custom list of configuration validators to be run when updating to a new target configuration, or otherwise uses the default validators returned by DefaultScheduler.defaultConfigValidators().
      DefaultScheduler.Builder setEndpointProducer(java.lang.String name, EndpointProducer endpointProducer)
      Specifies a custom EndpointProducer to be added to the /endpoints API.
      DefaultScheduler.Builder setPlans(java.util.Collection<Plan> plans)
      Sets the provided Plans to this instance.
      DefaultScheduler.Builder setPlansFrom(RawServiceSpec rawServiceSpec)
      Sets the Plans from the provided RawServiceSpec to this instance, using a DefaultPlanGenerator to handle conversion.
      DefaultScheduler.Builder setRecoveryManagerFactory(RecoveryPlanManagerFactory recoveryManagerFactory)
      Sets the provided PlanManager to be the plan manager used for recovery.
      DefaultScheduler.Builder setRestartHook(RestartHook restartHook)
      Specifies a custom RestartHook to be added to the /pods//restart and /pods//replace APIs.
      DefaultScheduler.Builder setStateStore(StateStore stateStore)
      Specifies a custom StateStore, otherwise the return value of DefaultScheduler.createStateStore(ServiceSpec) will be used.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getServiceSpec

        public ServiceSpec getServiceSpec()
        Returns the ServiceSpec which was provided via the constructor.

      • setStateStore

        public DefaultScheduler.Builder setStateStore(StateStore stateStore)
        Specifies a custom StateStore, otherwise the return value of DefaultScheduler.createStateStore(ServiceSpec) will be used. The state store persists copies of task information and task status for all tasks running in the service.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the state store is already set, via a previous call to either setStateStore(StateStore) or to getStateStore()

      • getStateStore

        public StateStore getStateStore()
        Returns the StateStore provided via setStateStore(StateStore), or a reasonable default created via DefaultScheduler.createStateStore(ServiceSpec). In order to avoid cohesiveness issues between this setting and the build() step, setStateStore(StateStore) may not be invoked after this has been called.

      • setConfigStore

        public DefaultScheduler.Builder setConfigStore(ConfigStore<ServiceSpec> configStore)
        Specifies a custom ConfigStore, otherwise the return value of DefaultScheduler.createConfigStore(ServiceSpec) will be used. The config store persists a copy of the current configuration ('target' configuration), while also storing historical configurations.

      • setConfigValidators

        public DefaultScheduler.Builder setConfigValidators(java.util.Collection<ConfigValidator<ServiceSpec>> configValidators)
        Specifies a custom list of configuration validators to be run when updating to a new target configuration, or otherwise uses the default validators returned by DefaultScheduler.defaultConfigValidators(). These validators are only used if #withOfferRequirementProvider(OfferRequirementProvider) was NOT invoked.

      • setRestartHook

        public DefaultScheduler.Builder setRestartHook(RestartHook restartHook)
        Specifies a custom RestartHook to be added to the /pods//restart and /pods//replace APIs. This may be used to define any custom teardown behavior which should be invoked before a task is restarted and/or replaced.

      • setEndpointProducer

        public DefaultScheduler.Builder setEndpointProducer(java.lang.String name,
                                                    EndpointProducer endpointProducer)
        Specifies a custom EndpointProducer to be added to the /endpoints API. This may be used by services which wish to expose custom endpoint information via that API.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the endpoint to be exposed
        endpointProducer - the producer to be invoked when the provided endpoint name is requested

      • setPlansFrom

        public DefaultScheduler.Builder setPlansFrom(RawServiceSpec rawServiceSpec)
                                      throws ConfigStoreException
        Sets the Plans from the provided RawServiceSpec to this instance, using a DefaultPlanGenerator to handle conversion. This is overridden by any plans manually provided by setPlans(Collection).
        Throws:
        ConfigStoreException - if creating a default config store fails
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the plans were already set either via this call or via setPlans(Collection)

      • setPlans

        public DefaultScheduler.Builder setPlans(java.util.Collection<Plan> plans)
        Sets the provided Plans to this instance. This may be used when no RawServiceSpec is available, and overrides any calls to setPlansFrom(RawServiceSpec).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the plans were already set either via this call or via #setPlans(RawServiceSpec)

      • setRecoveryManagerFactory

        public DefaultScheduler.Builder setRecoveryManagerFactory(RecoveryPlanManagerFactory recoveryManagerFactory)
        Sets the provided PlanManager to be the plan manager used for recovery.
        Parameters:
        recoveryManagerFactory - the factory whcih generates the custom recovery plan manager

      • setCapabilities

        public DefaultScheduler.Builder setCapabilities(Capabilities capabilities)
        Allow setting the capabilities of the DC/OS cluster. Generally this should not be used except in test environments as it may return incorrect information regarding the capabilities of the DC/OS cluster.
        Parameters:
        capabilities - the capabilities used to validate the ServiceSpec

      • build

        public DefaultScheduler build()
        Creates a new scheduler instance with the provided values or their defaults.
        Returns:
        a new scheduler instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if config validation failed when updating the target config for a default OfferRequirementProvider, or if creating a default ConfigStore failed
